phrases: The weather's so nice again today.
That is right.
Leo-sama.
Nanami-san.
Good morning.
Indeed.
Violet-san, good morning!
That is a lot of paperwork!
Yup.
This is the list of participants for the upcoming annual event.
Looks like we have got a lot again this year.
It is a wonderful thing.
Event?
Some kind of festival?
Oh, this is for my arranged marriage meetings.
All these people want to marry Leo-sama.
I see.
An arranged marriage, huh?
An arranged marriage?!
The Lion's Arranged Marriage
Leo-sama's meeting with potential husbands?
Yup.
You come, too.
It is fun.
I can watch?
Sure.
Actually, invitations should have gone to
the Princess and your knights.
Noir and I are going to be doing the commentary.
Commentary?
Yup.
We have got a lot of people here this year, too.
25 more than last year, it seems.
Merchandise and concession sales are doing well.
It is a good thing.
It is thanks to everyone.
Well, there is a lot of things I could say about it,
but it is a wonderful way to earn money.
It is time, everybody!
At the mics today we have got Framboise Charley from Galette National Broadcasting,
and Jean Casoni!
And providing commentary is...
Crown prince of Galette, Gaul Galette des Rois
and Noir, the center of the Imperial Guard Unit Genoise.
Thanks for having us here today.
Lady Leonmitchelli, one of the most powerful
there are no shortage of men who want to marry her.
And there is only one thing she has to say to them.
I want you to fight me one on one, and defeat me!
I, Leonmitchelli, will accept a challenge from anyone.
If you want a shot at marrying me, come get me!
Chosen warriors from
every nation have appeared to battle her.
They all look strong.
And they are all looking at...
There she is!
Lady Leo!
I am Leonmitchelli Galette des Rois!
I am happy you have all come here today to try and marry me.
People older and younger than me,
knights and nobles, royals and citizens.
Men of many positions are here,
but you have only thing you must do!
Defeat me!
I promise to give marriage proposals from those who
defeat me top priority and serious consideration!
This is an arranged marriage?
It seems like how she would do it, I guess.
I was surprised, too.
Well, it is pretty strange, but...
The fact that it is a worthwhile commercial enterprise
is what makes Leo-sama amazing.
Yup.
What is wrong, Vert?
No.
It is nothing.
Okay, it is time for our first fight!
The challenger is a young knight
from the land of Orange, here for his second time, Lord Raymond!
In the war game a few days ago, he succeeded in defeating 500 enemies!
Lady Leo, let us fight!
Yes, come!
Please go out with me, and hopefully marry me!
I am moved and grateful for your request.
But...
You are not there yet!
Here I go!
He is down!
Down!
Lord Raymond was wiped out instantly!
Lord Raymond's a strong knight, but...
It is amazing he was able to even take the first blow.
So true.
Lady Leo is praising him for his excellent fighting.
Lady Leo is wonderful!
Is not she?
Round two!
Defense Minister of the country of Dragee, and master of the long sword,
Lord Belier, has come to the fight today!
Lady, please come with me this year.
Once again, I am honored by your request.
But...
I will win you with this blade!
The battle begins!
National Defense Blade: Dragon King's Rage Slash!
Lord Belier's crest blade!
The dragon's aura is attacking Lady Leo!
I just fought a dragon a few days ago
and your vigor matches that of a true dragon!
Lion King Roaring Thunder Blade!
Exploding Lightning Fang!
The fight is over!
Lady Leo strikes with one slash of her blade!
Lord Belier is down!
Leo-sama is so cool!
Next up is the incredibly strong leader of the knights
from the Dukedom of Camibel.
Lord Dorg!
His massive strength and specially-ordered axe
are said to be able to destroy a fortress!
Here I come.
Lord Dorg.
You have gotten even stronger, it seems.
I am so happy and grateful you said that!
But it is
not enough yet!
She was every bit as strong as the massive Lord Dorg.
Our leader's got incredible strength.
She will not lose in a contest of strength.
Our fourth fighter is General Alfried
from Eldonia in the West!
I will share my burning love with you!
And General Blood, also from Eldonia!
Winner of a thousand battles in his own country's coliseum!
Lady, this year...
Leader of Lagunia's assault forces and master of martial arts,
it is Lord Deen!
The swordsman Miyama from Hinoura in the east!
Lady Leo keeps winning!
She is not letting any of her suitors get near!
Oh, we have got a message from the VIP seats!
Hi!
Yup!
Leo-sama keeps winning!
If you are too strong,
you will never find anybody to marry you.
Nobody's asking you.
They are all such fierce opponents that
I am truly enjoying myself.
It is great fun to be able to fight without holding back.
I am grateful to every one of my suitors!
There are only a few suitors left!
Who is next?
Thank you for having me here.
Maybe I should not be talking,
but the next fighter is really tiny.
Where did he come from?
The next challenger has asked that
their name and nationality...
be kept secret.
I am sorry.
I am the one who said I would accept anyone's challenge.
It is fine.
So your weapons are a sword and...
Is that a crossbow?
Yes.
Then I will fight you with a short bow and a sword.
Thank you very much.
Hey, Gaul-sama.
Is that...
Yup.
Seems like it.
Now let the games begin!
First they will be fighting with the bow.
Both of them are quietly drawing their bows...
That was...
He is fast!
I could not follow that at all.
Leo-sama got a hit in when she was shot, did not she?
Yeah.
That probably saved her from a second attack.
He might be really good.
Yeah, they are amazing!
There are not that many fighters this good in the countries around us.
If they are hiding their name and face, they must be someone I know,
but I cannot figure out who.
Have you and I met before?
Yes.
I am sorry.
I just cannot seem to remember.
If I win, I will tell you.
I see.
But I do not enjoy fighting when something is bothering me.
I am knocking off
that cloak.
Aerial
Explosive Slash!
Oh, wow!
I suppose we should have guessed!
The challenger is a young boy!
He is really cute.
Hey, is not that...
He is got the same ears and tail as you?
Is that...
Yup.
The 8th Prince of my homeland, Halver.
Leaf Lang du Sha Halver!
I remember!
We have met before!
I helped you practice with the bow and sword, too.
You were such a little kid,
but you were always serious about your training.
Even if we have not had much of a chance to see each other over the past few years,
I have never forgotten you.
But I am sorry... you would grown up so strong
I did not realize it was you.
Thank you.
But I still have a lot of growing up to do, both physically and in my training!
Prince Gaul, Noir-san,
who is that?
The 8th Prince of the northern country of Sankt Halver.
He is a distant relative of our Vert.
That is right, Vert-san is also from Halver, is not she?
I would heard he would been practicing his sword and archery,
but I never thought he would get that strong.
And I am really surprised he is one of Leo-sama's suitors.
This brings back so many memories.
What were we talking about when we last met?
You showed me the path I should travel!
You are really growing up.
You should keep learning from the
knights of your country and train every day.
Okay!
You have got such a pretty face.
If you get stronger, I am sure the girls will love you.
Really?
What?
Do you have a girl you are in love with?
No, well...
It is okay.
That is healthy.
Get strong and tell that girl what you think of her.
Will she love me back?
Sure!
If you are a strong, kind, and smart adult,
I am sure she will.
Oh, I remember
that now!
But if you are here...
A romance with a childhood friend!
Prince Leaf is so wonderful!
That is right!
Um, so that is why
I was hiding my name and appearance.
So you did not have to think about anything else during the fight.
I-I see...
Thank you for your kindness.
If I win, there is a lot I want to tell you.
I would love to hear it,
but sadly it will not be happening this year.
Because I am going to win!
What is this?
Both of them are ready to end the fight with their best moves!
The next strike will likely end the battle!
Exploding Heat Dragon Slash!
That is right.
That is the kind of tactic I like!
A huge explosion!
Their attacks collided
and there was a huge explosion!
Who will still be standing?
Wh-What is this?
The prince could not match Lady Leo!
But he fought a
great battle and almost won!
Well done.
I am grateful.
Thank you.
I will not praise you
and tell you you have gotten stronger.
I must get stronger so I will not lose to you.
Then I will get even stronger.
Everybody, give them another big round of applause!
I-I did not expect this!
Lady Leo's armor was
this close to being completely destroyed.
Um...
What is going on here?
An after party for the arranged marriage games.
A place for ladies and gentlemen to meet and get to know each other, I am told.
It is also a place for people of other countries to get to know each other.
And it is a great place for young people to meet new romantic encounters.
We are going
to see the princess, okay?
I am not good with parties.
I am more interested in food than meeting men.
I want to go with you.
Me, too!
That is not fair, Yukki, Rico!
You come with us, too, Hero!
Everybody!
Hero!
I have seen the broadcasts of your activities!
And you were amazing today, Prince Leaf!
You were so cool!
Really!
Thank you.
It is amazing how strong you are,
but it is also amazing that you decided to come here today!
It is wonderful that you are thinking about marriage
at such a young age.
Marriage?
I do not really know what that is,
but I wanted to be able to talk to Leo-sama,
so I joined today.
Huh, Leaf?
You did not want to marry Leo-sama?
At an arranged marriage you spend a lot of time
talking to somebody in a quiet place, right?
No!
An arranged marriage meeting is the first step to a marriage, and...
No, well...
I cannot believe I did that in front of all those people!
Well, it is okay.
It is true that you like Leo-sama.
And Leo-sama seemed to like you, too.
Yup, yup!
Prince!
Oh no!
We need to let him lie down.
That is one more thing to look forward to.
It was another wonderful arranged marriage meeting this year.
Leaf, I am looking forward to the day you defeat me!
Um, I will do my best.
The Little Prince and the Legendary Hero
Do your best, Leaf!
